Detailed Description

Represents the Style used to paint the keyboard.

The keyboard uses a style file to paint itself. This files defines the SVG elements used to draw each item. There are two kinds of items: the shapes are used to draw the background of the key and the symbols are used to draw the symbol over the key. The style file is an XML file structured as follow: 

 <style>
    <shapes>
       <defs>SVG defs</defs>
       list of shapes
    </shapes>
    <symbols>
       <defs>SVG defs</defs>
       list of symbols
    </symbols>
 </style>
where:
  • SVG defs is the svg definitions to include in each svg element in the current node.
  • list of shapes is a list of shape elements. See the StyleShape class for a complete definition of the shape elements.
  • list of symbols is a list of symbol elements. See the StyleSymbol class for a complete definition of the symbol elements.
The SVG defs are useful not to repeat the same SVG definitions in every single element of the node.
See also:
StyleShape

StyleSymbol
